actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and modify the railroad track maintenance credit.
short_title: Short Line Railroad Rehabilitation and Investment Act of 2015

summary.text:
Short Line Railroad Rehabilitation and Investment Act of 2015

 Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the tax credit for railroad track maintenance, to: (1) expand the types of maintenance expenditures eligible for such credit, and (2) extend such credit through 2016.

titles.title: Short Line Railroad Rehabilitation and Investment Act of 2015
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and modify the railroad track maintenance credit.
Short Line Railroad Rehabilitation and Investment Act of 2015
